<MethodEndpoint

Adds a datasource user or updates an existing user.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Describes the request body of the /indexuser API call","properties":{"version":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Version number for document for optimistic concurrency control. If absent or 0 then no version checks are done."},"datasource":{"type":"string","description":"The datasource for which the user is added"},"user":{"description":"The user to be added or updated","type":"object","properties":{"email":{"type":"string"},"userId":{"description":"To be supplied if the user id in the datasource is not the email","type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"isActive":{"type":"boolean","description":"set to false if the user is a former employee or a bot"}},"required":["email","name"],"title":"DatasourceUserDefinition"}},"required":["datasource","user"],"title":"IndexUserRequest"}}},"required":true,"x-exportParamName":"IndexUserRequest"}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
